text: mariyu isa spastamaina (ma) sucanalu tisukoni vaccinappudu ila annadu: "Vastavanga, nenu mi vaddaku vivekanni tisukoni vaccanu; mariyu miru vibhedalaku lonaina konni visayala vastavanni miku spastanga vivarincataniki vaccanu. Kavuna miru allah patla bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi. Mariyu nannu anusarincandi
